game_description: Inspired by revered 80's classics like Tempest & Asteroids, Match Blast brings a zen-like focus and fun gameplay to a first-person shooter style VR game. Strap in and get ready to use your mind and your trigger fingers to beat the odds in Match Blast. • Use your wits to stay focused and blast the targets that come at you from the three tunnels before you. • Earn gems to unlock new blasters and level designs. •Equip your earned blasters to both hands or mix it up to suit your mood. Match Blast is a must have for Quest owners.
review_1: Very simple and easy concepts. Great way to improve your reaction/response time. Good for your VR mental workouts
